name: Devil's Little Helper
description:
Devil’s little helper is a platform in a 2.5D environment game in which the Player will impersonate Malacoda, a little demon whose scope is to hunt and collect souls for his mistress Hel accompanied by Khron, his faithful friend. The Player starts from his shelter and can go on by exploring Limbo in order to gather souls for his master.

Controls

AD - Left/Right Movement
Left Click/E - Melee Attack
F - Dash (In order to avoid attacks or move further horizontally)
X - Interaction
I - Inventory Toggle
Space - Jump/Double Jump/Wall Jump
Space on Item in Inventory - Consume (The Souls are used also as Health Item)

Alt+F4 to close the game (kek)

Gamepad support is available but mapping could be a little bit buggy.
